name: Project Security Guard
description: Project-scoped security hook that blocks dangerous Bash commands and sensitive file access while auto-approving safe dev workflows.
longDescription: Project-scoped PreToolUse hook that blocks dangerous Bash commands (rm outside project, force push, DROP TABLE, terraform destroy, docker prune, eval, network exfiltration) and sensitive file access, while auto-approving safe dev workflow commands and remembering granted permissions.
